array.name: content
array.item:
CAUSES: 
 Natural Causes
1. Green house effect i.e. a gas that traps heat in the earth's atmosphere.
2. Earth goes through a cycle of climate change.

 Man made causes
1. Carbon dioxide and other gases from power plants.
2. Pollution.
3. Building,both commercial and residental area.
4. Deforestation.
5. Increase in usage of chemical fertilizers.

 Effects
1. Rise in sea level world wide which is responsible for natural disasters.
2. Increase in storms like hurricanes.
3. Massive crop fertilizers.
4. Extinction of species.
5. Disappearance of coral reefs.

Solutions
1. Reduce pollution using car pooling and public transport.
2. Afforestation.
3. using alternative gas like C.N.G.
4. Minimum use of technology appliances like air conditions.

Factors
 Individual Factors
1. A minor who has a lower intelligence and who has not received proper education.
2. Uncontrolled Aggression.
3. Lack of proper parental supervision.
4. Ongoing parental Conflicts.
5. Media.

 Prevention
'Prevention is always Better than cure'
1. Education
2. Recreation Activities which will help students to reduce loneliness.
3. Community involvement: Community group provides youth a safe social environment to grow, develop and flourish.

Reasons
 1. Better economic prospects
 2. HIgher Salary and income
 3.Better level of living
 4.Intellectual freedom
 5.Better working environment.

Solutions:-
 1.Government should promote industrialization 
 2. Increase Working condition 
 3. Increase foreign investments
 4. Parents should not encourage their children to go abroad and settle there.
 5. Provision of maximum security.
 6. Improve educational standard.

Benefits: -
1. People come to know about bussiness.
2. Provides employment to lot of people.
3. Help customers to compare prices of same product.
4. Commercial Ad is artistic and thought provoking.

Drawbacks: -
1. Advertisement are not productive; it is wasteful expenditure and financial burden on company.
2. Some advertisement provides fake quality
3. Advertisements make people spend thrift.
4. Some ads appeal people to use articles that are harmful to health.

Crime is a serious issue of many countries in the contemporary society; in particular, the crime rate gradually increases annually in some sectors worldwide

	Causes
1.Poverty is main reason due to which people rob to earn bread and binner
2.Violence from media which provides individuals negative influences
3.Losing control of oneâ€™s emotions or physiology.
4. First time offenders committing crimes again.

	Solutions
1.Severe punishments
2. Improvements in education.
3. Ameliorating living conditions.

It is an undeniable fact that people have been fond of latest fashions, hairstyles and innovations of technology over the last few years.

	Pros
1. It enhances personality.
2. Helps people to move with time and society.
3.Makes a person more confident.

	Cons
1. Makes a person spend thrift (makes a hole in one's pocket)
2.Fashion destroys the culture of country.
3. Lured by fashion resulting diversion from studies and career.

A person moves from one job to another within a relatively short period of time, it is called job hopping.

	Reasons
1. Dis-satisfaction with job.
2. Health issues.
3. A lot of presssure on employees.

	Remedies
1. Be Generous.
2. Company should take regular feedback
3. person should keep himself self motivated.

Globalisation is a common scenario. It means integration of world economically, socially, politically.

	Pros
1. We all become equal.
2. The world has one universal standard of quality for all.
3. More opportunity for employment.
4. Reduces poverty.

	Cons
1. Countries lose their culture and tradition.
2. Fashion and advertising will not always suit different religious and cultural ideals, therefore create problems.
3. Companies migrate to countries whee labour is cheap
